hotspot.title: JOHANNESDAL HAL
hotspot.description:
johannesdal hall
Johannesdal Hal has enormous picture windows overlooking the majestic mountains surrounding Johannesdal 1207. The hall has seating for 200 guests with a dance floor.

hotspot.title: SILWERBOOM SUITE
hotspot.description:
silver tree suite
Our elegant Silwerboom-Suite is totally private and consists of a very spacious bedroom which opens out onto a private courtyard with a verandah and a small plunge pool.

hotspot.title: DIE VOORTUIN
hotspot.description:
the ponds
Our entrance garden with its two ponds filled with water lilies is the ideal place to receive your guests to Johannesdal Hal with welcoming drinks. It is a beautiful protected outdoor space and it leads directly into Johannesdal Hal.

hotspot.title: DIE SUURLEMOENBOORD
hotspot.description:
the lemon orchards
This citrus garden terrace lies at the top end of the garden terraces leading down to the river at the far end of our property. It overlooks the magnificent mountains surrounding Johannesdal 1207. It is easily accessible from the main hall and is the perfect spot for prefunction drinks on a beautiful day. For non-residential bookings, this area is only available under certain conditions to be discussed with our venue manager.

hotspot.title: DIE TERASSE
hotspot.description:
the terraces
Our two large garden terraces boast unsurpassable views. From both meticulously groomed terraces, there is an unobstructed view over the mountains surrounding Johannesdal 1207. Our terraced garden is the perfect space to have an open-air ceremony or early morning/late-afternoon outdoor function. For non-residential bookings this area is only available under certain conditions to be discussed with our venue manager.

hotspot.title: ONDER DIE EIK TERASSE
hotspot.description:
terrace under the oak
A massive old Oak tree towers over this enclosed space in our garden, a perfect area for pre/post function drinks. This area is directly linked to the Waterlelietuin and could be used in conjunction with it, creating space for an outdoor function for up to 100 people. For non-residential bookings, this area is only available under certain conditions to be discussed with our venue manager.

hotspot.title: WATERLELIETUIN
hotspot.description:
waterlily garden
This small enclosed garden has a pavilion overlooking the lily ponds. It is a lovely area for pre-function drinks or smaller intimate outdoor gatherings. For non-residential bookings this area is only available under certain conditions to be discussed with our venue manager.

hotspot.title: KARDAMOM BUITEKAMER
hotspot.description:
cardamom secluded bedroom
Kardamom is a romantic, cosy bedroom. Set apart from the other rooms, it has a balcony overlooking the magnificent mountains surrounding Johannesdal1207 and a small private outdoor pond.

hotspot.title: BLOU DISA HUISIE
hotspot.description:
blue disa cottage
This beautiful cottage is filled with light. The decor is colorful, quirky and comfortable. In Blou Disa cottage the main bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and shares a shower and toilet with its second bedroom. The main bedroom opens up onto an enclosed courtyard with a magnificent view onto the surrounding Drakenstein mountains. The kitchen, with a picture window overlooking the pool area, is very well equipped with a free standing stove, large fridge/freezer and a dish washer. It has ample space and has a dining table with seating for six guests. The cottage has a beautiful, large lounge with a TV which leads out onto the pool courtyard garden on the one side and a private enclosed verandah on the other, with breathtaking views over the surrounding mountains.

hotspot.title: SAFFRAAN SUITE
hotspot.description:
saffron suite
This beautifully decorated suite has a seating area and a large comfortable, private verandah which leads out onto the pool courtyard.

hotspot.title: WATERLELIE SUITE
hotspot.description:
waterlily suite
The beautiful decoration for this suite was inspired by the waterlily ponds which it overlooks. It lives out onto a lovely, large, private verandah which leads out onto the pool courtyard.

hotspot.title: A starlit ballroom in nature @ Johannesdal 1207
WATERLELIETUIN
hotspot.description:
waterlily garden

hotspot.title: WATERLELIETUIN
hotspot.description:

hotspot.title: DIE BLOU KAMER
hotspot.description:
the blue room
A reception area which can be used for small gatherings and is ideal for conferences for up to 100 attendees. This area will be utilised in case of bad weather to host pre-function cocktails or ceremonies. It is available to rent to any of our clients who want their function to continue unhindered with music and dancing all night

hotspot.title: DIE STOEP
hotspot.description: the breakfast terrace Die Stoepkamer opens up onto Die Veranda facing the pool courtyard. It is the ideal area to have a small summer party or year-end functions. It is available to rent when we have no overnight guests.

hotspot.title: DIE STOEPKAMER
hotspot.description:
the reading room
This is a comfortable area with a well equipped and well stocked, galley type kitchen where our overnight guests will be able to have their breakfast. Overnight guests could host a small pre/post event here for up to 20 friends at no additional cost.
